p1.name: BreezeNow
p1.description: A responsive and real-time weather application built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. It fetches live weather data using the WeatherAPI and displays detailed metrics including temperature, humidity, wind speed, UV index, and more.

p2.name: Campus Utility Hub
p2.description: A beginner-friendly web application providing essential student tools such as CGPA calculation, attendance tracking, exam countdown, study timer, expense tracking, and water intake monitoring in a single browser-based platform.

p3.name: CommentSense
p3.description: An open-source comment moderation API that classifies comments as positive, neutral, or negative and detects abusive, vulgar, or spam content to promote healthier online discussions.

p4.name: The Lighthouse
p4.description: A modern restaurant website featuring a clean UI and simple online table reservation functionality.

p5.name: QRBuilder
p5.description: A React-based QR code generator supporting color customization, logo embedding, real-time preview, and PNG download with a clean and responsive UI.

p6.name: LacoPred
p6.description: A machine learning project that predicts land prices across Indian regions using Linear Regression with one-hot encoding and CSV-based training data.

p7.name: CSV-Parser-Cpp
p7.description: A C++ in-memory CSV parser supporting header-based operations, sorting, derived columns, and exporting results through an interactive CLI.

p8.name: Dictionary
p8.description: A Python Tkinter desktop dictionary application that fetches word meanings and usage examples from an online dictionary API.

p9.name: Quiz_project
p9.description: A full-stack Flask-based online quiz application with MCQs, instant scoring, CSV-based question management, and live cloud deployment.

p10.name: Habit Tracker
p10.description: A backend REST API for tracking habits and tasks with clean domain modeling, ownership enforcement, soft deletion, and production-grade design.

p11.name: Elementorix
p11.description: A collaborative open-source React component library built with modern technologies and community-driven development.

p12.name: Polling System
p12.description: A full-stack web application that allows users to create polls, cast votes, and view poll results securely with proper backend voting logic.

p13.name: GrowCraft
p13.description: A service-based platform designed to help businesses grow online while offering students hands-on training and internship opportunities.

p14.name: CampusOne
p14.description: A comprehensive Flutter application that centralizes college activities, events, and society management into one elegant platform.

p15.name: Sales Dashboard (Power BI)
p15.description: A Power BI dashboard using Power Query for data transformation and interactive visualizations to track and analyze sales performance.

p16.name: Master ZSH
p16.description: A powerful, feature-rich, and well-organized ZSH configuration crafted to enhance developer productivity.

p17.name: Kingsukh GuestHouse
p17.description: A single-page hotel room booking website with a clean and user-friendly interface.

p18.name: Typespeed
p18.description: An interactive typing speed test measuring WPM, accuracy, and time, ideal for practicing JavaScript DOM manipulation and timers.

p19.name: Quote Generator
p19.description: A Quote of the Day web app that fetches random quotes from a public API and allows users to share them on Twitter.

p20.name: NutriPlan Lite
p20.description: A high-performance, glassmorphism-style calorie tracker using the Mifflin-St Jeor Equation for personalized goals with real-time food logging and a responsive Tailwind UI.

p21.name: QR Code Generator
p21.description: A simple QR code generator that creates QR codes from text or URLs using a free API, featuring input validation, shake animations, and smooth transitions.
